name: Constrained Form-Finding
description: Optimize for a form in equilibrium that meets geometric and force constraints.

inputParameters.name: constraints
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM optimization constraints.

inputParameters.name: parameters
inputParameters.description: A list of COMPAS CEM optimization parameters.

inputParameters.name: algorithm
inputParameters.description: The name of the optimization algorithm to use. Defaults to LD_SLSQP.

inputParameters.name: iters_max
inputParameters.description: The maximum number of iterations to run the optimization algorithm for. Defaults to 100.

inputParameters.name: eps
inputParameters.description: The minimum objective or norm of the gradient value to declare convergence. Defaults to 1e-6.

inputParameters.name: tmax
inputParameters.description: The maximum number of iterations to run the form-finding algorithm for. Defaults to 100.

inputParameters.name: eta
inputParameters.description: The convergence threshold of the form-finding algorithm. Default to 1e-6.

outputParameters.name: form
outputParameters.description: A COMPAS CEM form diagram in static equilibrium.

outputParameters.name: objective
outputParameters.description: The resulting value of the objective function.

outputParameters.name: grad_norm
outputParameters.description: The norm of the gradient of the objective function.

outputParameters.name: status
outputParameters.description: The final status of the optimization process.
